InvalidAgreement().details: Thrown when the agreement is other than the Constant Flow Agreement V1

InvalidReceiver().details: Thrown when the receiver is the zero adress.

InvalidToken().details: Thrown when the token being streamed to this contract is invalid

ReceiverIsSuperApp().details: Thrown when receiver is also a super app.

Unauthorized().details: Thrown when the callback caller is not the host.

returns.flowRate: Flow rate from this contract to the receiver.
returns.startTime: Start time of the current flow.

_receiver().notice: This is the current receiver that all streams will be redirected to.

currentReceiver().notice: Returns current receiver's address, start time, and flow rate.

userdoc.notice: Inherits the ERC721 NFT interface from Open Zeppelin and the RedirectAll logic to redirect all incoming streams to the current NFT holder.
